EventFilter
public class NonErrorsOnlyEventFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventFilter

Event filter implementation that filters out all events that are error notifications. $Id: NonErrorsOnlyEventFilter.java,v 1.1 2003/04/07 15:50:53 vanrogu Exp $
